food.question: I am yellow and yummy. Monkeys like to peel me! What am I?

hints.text: 💛 I am the color of sunshine!
🐒 Monkeys love to eat me!
〰️ You peel my skin off before eating me.

food.question: I am small and round, and I go 'pop' when you cook me! What am I?

hints.text: 🌽 I come from a big plant in a field!
🔥 I need heat to become yummy!
🔊 I make a popping sound!

food.question: I am orange and crunchy. Bunnies love to eat me! What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I grow in the ground!
🐰 A bunny's favorite food.
💪 Eating me is good for your eyes.

food.question: I am white and good with cookies. Cows give you me! What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 I am a liquid.
🐄 You get me from a cow.
🍪 I am yummy with cookies.

food.question: I'm a fruit, red and sweet, and grow on a tree. What am I?

hints.text: 🍎 Snow White ate me.
🌳 I hang from a tree.
😋 I'm yummy in a pie!

food.question: I am long and green. You can eat me with dip! What am I?

hints.text: 🥒 I'm a cool and refreshing vegetable.
🥗 You can find me in a salad.
✨ I'm good with ranch.

food.question: I am round and red, and taste good in a salad or on pizza! What am I?

hints.text: 🍅 I am juicy.
🍕 You can put me on pizza!
🥗 I make a salad taste great.

food.question: I am made from wheat. You can put butter and jam on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌾 I'm made from grain.
🍞 You can make a sandwich with me.
🧈 I taste good toasted with butter.

food.question: I am white or yellow inside and grow underground. People like to make fries out of me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥔 You can bake, boil, or fry me!
🍟 I am yummy when turned into french fries.
🌱 I grow under the soil

food.question: I am small, sweet, and juicy. I come in many colors, like red, green, or purple. What am I?

hints.text: 🍇 You can eat me right off the vine.
🍷 I can be used to make juice and wine.
🥣 You can find me in a fruit salad.

plant.question: I am green and grow in the ground. Animals like to munch on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I am short
🐄 Cows like to eat me
🎾 I am the color of a tennis ball

plant.question: I am red and round and yummy to eat. I grow on a plant. What am I?

hints.text: ❤️ My color is like a heart
🍅 I am juicy
🥪 You can put me on a sandwich

plant.question: I am tall and strong and have many leaves. Birds like to build nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I have a trunk
🍁 My leaves change color in the fall
🐿️ Squirrels love to climb me

plant.question: I am yellow and sweet, and grow inside a green husk. You can eat me off the cob. What am I?

hints.text: 🌽 I grow on a stalk
🍿 You can pop me!
👨‍🌾 Farmers grow lots of me

plant.question: I am a pretty color and smell nice. Bees like to visit me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌷 I grow in a garden
💐 People give me as a gift
🌸 I have petals

plant.question: I am long and orange, and a yummy snack for rabbits. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I grow under the ground
👓 I am good for your eyes
🥗 You can eat me raw in a salad

plant.question: I am big and green on the outside and pink or red on the inside. I have black seeds. What am I?

hints.text: 🍉 I am very juicy
☀️ I am a popular summer treat
🏖️ You might eat me at the beach

plant.question: I am brown and bumpy, and grow on a tree. Squirrels love to hide me for winter. What am I?

hints.text: 🌰 I am a hard seed
🍂 I fall from trees in autumn
🐿️ Squirrels bury me

plant.question: I am prickly on the outside and sweet and juicy on the inside. You can eat me with a spoon.

hints.text: 🌵 I grow in hot, dry places.
🥄 You cut me in half to eat me.
🏜️ I am a desert plant

plant.question: I am small and green, and grow close to the ground. When you step on me, I smell good. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I am an herb
🍕 I taste good on pizza
🇮🇹 I am used in Italian cooking
